text: Primm is a small unincorporated community in Clark County, Nevada, United States. Primm was featured in the video game, Fallout: New Vegas where it had Vikki and Vance Casino which was based on Primm's Whiskey Pete's and the Bison Steve Hotel which was based on Buffalo Bill's Casino and had the roller coaster. == Other websites == * Primm on travelnevada.com Category:Unincorporated communities in Nevada
title: Primm, Nevada
